overview:
Kord has been actively involved in marketing software and hardware in the technology and digital media space. Most recently a Director of marketing and Business Development at noted music apps start-up Sound Trends.

His positions have cut across multiple marketing disciplines that include product/program/project/partner management, marcom activities (branding, positioning, social media, advertising, PR, etc.) and business development.

Time spent at both start-ups (Sound Trends, Active Sky, Staccato) and larger, Fortune listed companies (Apple, sgi) has given him a wide industry perspective.

With a background particularly rich in digital media, Kord is tuned to the changes in the entertainment food chain - from content creation to distribution.
